row.process:
! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred ! variables ! &KISS_HOSTNAME# ! ! referentiel VARA.TECHNICAL.NETDNS ! :SET &MY_IP#="0.0.0.0" :SET &MY_USER#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.NETDNS,"USER") :SET &MY_PASSWORD#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.NETDNS,"PASSWORD") :SET &MY_NETDNSSERVER#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.NETDNS,"NETDNSSERVER") :DEFINE &MY_RC#,string
echo ssh command NET::Dns if { $? -eq 0 ] ; then echo OK NET DNS : PSET &MY_RC#="OK" else echo KO NET DNS : PSET &MY_RC#="KO" fi

row.post_process: :IF &MY_RC# = "KO" : PRINT KO: RESERVATION IP NETDNS &KISS_HOSTNAME# !: PRINT DEBUG &EXIT_KISS_KO# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,RESERVATION IP NETDNS &KISS_HOSTNAME#" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="RESERVATION IP NETDNS &KISS_HOSTNAME#" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=10 :ELSE : PRINT OK: RESERVATION IP NETDNS &KISS_HOSTNAME# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_OK#="&EXIT_KISS_OK#,RESERVATION IP NETDNS &KISS_HOSTNAME#" :ENDIF
